Package Database

Class MazeDataJDBC

java.lang.Object
Database.MazeDataJDBC
All Implemented Interfaces:
MazeDataSource
public class MazeDataJDBC extends Object implements MazeDataSource
Class for retrieving data from the XML file holding the maze's list.
